price: (164) [The angels say],[1310] "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.[1311]
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
footnotes:
[1310]- Refuting what the disbelievers had said about them.
[1311]- For worship.  Or "an assigned task" to perform.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
